product_name: Hugger Mugger Autumn Wheat Yoga Mat
long_description: The Hugger Mugger Autumn Wheat yoga mag includes a limited edition wheat print that'll set you apart from the rest of the class. Durable, nonslip surface lets you go deep into poses. Antimicrobial properties are built-in to help control odors; wash the Hugger Mugger Autumn Wheat mat by hand with mild dish soap and water. Polyvinyl chloride (PVC) mat does not contain latex, phthalates or heavy metals.
short_description: The Hugger Mugger Autumn Wheat yoga mag includes a limited edition wheat print that'll set you apart from the rest of the class.
